Name: [**AMR_Search**](../workflows/standalone/amr_search.md)
Description: Perform AMR profiling on microbial assemblies mimicing Pathogenwatch

Name: [**Assembly_Fetch**](../workflows/data_import/assembly_fetch.md)
Description: Download assemblies from NCBI, after optionally identifying the closest RefSeq reference genome to your own draft assembly

Name: [**Augur**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/augur.md)
Description: Phylogenetic analysis for viral pathogens

Name: [**BaseSpace_Fetch**](../workflows/data_import/basespace_fetch.md)
Description: Import data from BaseSpace into Terra

Name: [**Cauris_CladeTyper**](../workflows/standalone/cauris_cladetyper.md)
Description: C. auris clade assignment

Name: [**Clair3_Variants**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/clair3_variants.md)
Description: ONT Variant Caller

Name: [**Concatenate_Column_Content**](../workflows/data_export/concatenate_column_content.md)
Description: Concatenate contents of a specified Terra data table column for many samples ("entities")

Name: [**Concatenate_Illumina_Lanes**](../workflows/standalone/concatenate_illumina_lanes.md)
Description: Concatenate Illumina lanes for a single sample

Name: [**Core_Gene_SNP**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/core_gene_snp.md)
Description: Pangenome analysis

Name: [**Create_Terra_Table**](../workflows/data_import/create_terra_table.md)
Description: Upload data to Terra and then run this workflow to have the table automatically created

Name: [**CZGenEpi_Prep**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/czgenepi_prep.md)
Description: Prepare metadata and fasta files for easy upload to the CZ GEN EPI platform.

Name: [**Dorado_Basecalling**](../workflows/standalone/dorado_basecalling.md)
Description: GPU-accelerated basecalling of Oxford Nanopore sequencing data

Name: [**Fetch_SRR_Accession**](../workflows/data_import/fetch_srr_accession.md)
Description: Provided a BioSample accession, identify any associated SRR accession(s)

Name: [**Find_Shared_Variants**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/find_shared_variants.md)
Description: Combines and reshapes variant data from Snippy_Variants to illustrate variants shared across multiple samples

Name: [**Freyja Workflow Series**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/freyja.md)
Description: Recovers relative lineage abundances from mixed sample data and generates visualizations

Name: [**GAMBIT_Query**](../workflows/standalone/gambit_query.md)
Description: Taxon identification of genome assembly using GAMBIT

Name: [**Kraken2**](../workflows/standalone/kraken2.md)
Description: Taxa identification from reads

Name: [**kSNP3**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/ksnp3.md)
Description: SNP-based phylogenetic analysis from assemblies

Name: [**kSNP4**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/ksnp4.md)
Description: SNP-based phylogenetic analysis from assemblies

Name: [**Lyve_SET**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/lyve_set.md)
Description: Alignment of reads to a reference genome, SNP calling, curation of high quality SNPs, phylogenetic analysis

Name: [**MashTree_FASTA**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/mashtree_fasta.md)
Description: Mash-distance based phylogenetic analysis from assemblies

Name: [**Mercury_Prep_N_Batch**](../workflows/public_data_sharing/mercury_prep_n_batch.md)
Description: Prepare metadata and sequence data for submission to NCBI and GISAID

Name: [**NCBI-AMRFinderPlus**](../workflows/standalone/ncbi_amrfinderplus.md)
Description: Runs NCBI's AMRFinderPlus on genome assemblies (bacterial and fungal)

Name: [**NCBI_Scrub**](../workflows/standalone/ncbi_scrub.md)
Description: Runs NCBI's HRRT on Illumina FASTQs

Name: [**Pangolin_Update**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/pangolin_update.md)
Description: Update Pangolin assignments

Name: [**RASUSA**](../workflows/standalone/rasusa.md)
Description: Randomly subsample sequencing reads to a specified coverage

Name: [**Rename_FASTQ**](../workflows/standalone/rename_fastq.md)
Description: Rename paired-end or single-end read files in a Terra data table in a non-destructive way

Name: [**Samples_to_Ref_Tree**](../workflows/phylogenetic_placement/samples_to_ref_tree.md)
Description: Use Nextclade to rapidly and accurately place your samples on any existing phylogenetic tree

Name: [**Snippy_Streamline**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/snippy_streamline.md)
Description: Implementation of Snippy workflows for phylogenetic analysis from reads, with optional dynamic reference selection

Name: [**Snippy_Streamline_FASTA**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/snippy_streamline_fasta.md)
Description: Implementation of Snippy workflows for phylogenetic analysis from assembled genomes (in FASTA format), with optional dynamic reference selection

Name: [**Snippy_Tree**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/snippy_tree.md)
Description: SNP-based phylogenetic analysis from reads, with option to mask recombination

Name: [**Snippy_Variants**](../workflows/phylogenetic_construction/snippy_variants.md)
Description: Alignment of reads to a reference genome, then SNP calling

Name: [**SRA_Fetch**](../workflows/data_import/sra_fetch.md)
Description: Import publicly available reads from SRA using SRR#, ERR# or DRR#

Name: [**TBProfiler_tNGS**](../workflows/standalone/tbprofiler_tngs.md)
Description: Performs in silico antimicrobial susceptibility testing on Mycobacterium tuberculosis targeted-NGS samples with TBProfiler and tbp-parser

Name: [**Terra_2_GISAID**](../workflows/public_data_sharing/terra_2_gisaid.md)
Description: Upload of assembly data to GISAID

Name: [**Terra_2_NCBI**](../workflows/public_data_sharing/terra_2_ncbi.md)
Description: Upload of sequence data to NCBI

Name: [**TheiaCov Workflow Series**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/theiacov.md)
Description: Viral genome assembly, QC and characterization from amplicon sequencing
Applicable Kingdom: HIV, Influenza, Monkeypox virus, RSV-A, RSV-B, SARS-CoV-2, Viral, WNV

Name: [**TheiaEuk**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/theiaeuk.md)
Description: Mycotic genome assembly, QC and characterization from WGS data

Name: [**TheiaMeta**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/theiameta.md)
Description: Genome assembly and QC from metagenomic sequencing

Name: [**TheiaProk Workflow Series**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/theiaprok.md)
Description: Bacterial genome assembly, QC and characterization from WGS data

Name: [**TheiaValidate**](../workflows/standalone/theiavalidate.md)
Description: This workflow performs basic comparisons between user-designated columns in two separate tables.

Name: [**Transfer_Column_Content**](../workflows/data_export/transfer_column_content.md)
Description: Transfer contents of a specified Terra data table column for many samples ("entities") to a GCP storage bucket location

Name: [**Usher**](../workflows/phylogenetic_placement/usher.md)
Description: Use UShER to rapidly and accurately place your samples on any existing phylogenetic tree

Name: [**VADR_Update**](../workflows/genomic_characterization/vadr_update.md)
Description: Update VADR assignments
Applicable Kingdom: HAV, Influenza, Monkeypox virus, RSV-A, RSV-B, SARS-CoV-2, Viral, WNV

Name: [**Zip_Column_Content**](../workflows/data_export/zip_column_content.md)
Description: Zip contents of a specified Terra data table column for many samples ("entities")
